questions.question: Which of the following is an advantage of using an inductive proximity switch?
Which of the following is a factor that affects the accuracy of a proximity switch?
Which of the following principles of operation is used by a capacitive proximity switch?
Which of the following is an application for a capacitive proximity switch?

answers.a: Sensing the level of a liquid
answers.b: Sensing the presence of a metallic object
answers.c: Sensing the temperature of an object
answers.d: Sensing the pressure of a gas

questions.question: Which of the following is a disadvantage of using a capacitive proximity switch?

answers.b: Susceptibility to interference from other objects
